title: Talan's Treasure
description: A romantic winter retreat for the shifters turns into a fight with Mother Natureâ€¦and a killer.When Adrian and Talan decide they need to spend some time alone, they drive up to a group of cabins owned by Adrian's old pack. However, instead of the romantic escapade they'd envisioned, their trip results in them finding the dead body of the caretaker, stabbed in the back.Adrian's determination to find out what happened leads them straight into the path of a killer, who thinks nothing of shooting a wolf shifter. With Adrian bleeding in his arms, Talan vows that whoever dared to harm his mate would soon breathe their last. Now trapped in the victim's cabin, their tyres slashed and a snowstorm on the way, however will they pass the time?
author: Amber Kell
